abstract: Joyce M. Chang, the former deputy editor at Time Inc.'s People StyleWatch magazine, has been named executive editor of Marie Claire.
snippet: Joyce M. Chang, the former deputy editor at Time Inc.'s People StyleWatch magazine, has been named executive editor of Marie Claire.
lead_paragraph: Joyce M. Chang, the former deputy editor at Time Inc.'s People StyleWatch magazine, will become executive editor of Marie Claire.

headline.main: New Top Editor Named for Marie Claire
